title: Stranger Things Final Season: First Explosive Teaser Drops – Hawkins Is Doomed
shortdescription: The beginning of the end – Netflix drops emotional first look at the epic conclusion.
author: TV Insider

content.content: /images/Stranger Things Final Season First Explosive Teaser.webp
Netflix just broke the internet: the first full teaser for Stranger Things Season 5 is here — and it’s darker, bigger, and more emotional than anyone expected.

Part 1 drops November 26, 2025 (Thanksgiving night tradition continues), with Part 2 following in early 2026. The teaser confirms returning favorites (yes, including Hopper’s beard and Eleven’s buzzcut), massive Upside Down battles, and a final showdown that destroys half of Hawkins.
The final shot of the kids — now full adults — holding hands as the sky cracks open had viewers sobbing. Millie Bobby Brown reportedly cried for 20 minutes after filming her last scene.
